author: Paul Cullen, Fiach Kelly, Pat Leahy, Vivienne Clarke, Freya McClements
title: Coronavirus: Government closes non-essential shops as seventh death confirmed
description: 204 new cases in State as gatherings restricted to four people and measures extended until April 19th
content:
One further death and 204 new confirmed cases pf Covid-19 have been reported by the National Public Health Emergency Team at its daily briefing on Tuesday evening.
The deceased patient, a male in the east of the country, had an underlying health condition.
… [+6588 chars]
